EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2016-05-Silicon Valley Meetup.EMAIL-Registered Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirming your attendance for this Friday
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=User Group Member}}!
Thank you for registering for VMTurboâ€™s first user group.
As president of the SoCal User Group, I look forward to meeting you all this week and to making the most of our day together. As a heads up, you should come prepared to:
- Learn about new ways to leverage VMTurbo and bring it to the next level
- Share your experience with VMTurbo
- Ask questions!
- Offer suggestions about what you would like to see
- Enjoy an excellent selection of drinks and apps
- Win some prizes and cool swag
- Have fun and network with peers, partners and the VMTurbo team
See you this Friday, May 20, 2016 at 1:00 PM PST at the Green Acre Campus Pointe Venue <[[http://greenacresd.com/campus-pointe/]]> on 10300 Campus Point Drive San Diego, CA 92121 . Should be a great time!
Best, Matt Matt McColm President, SoCal User Group Senior Data Center Engineer, EDF Renewable Energy
